import React from "react"; import CustomLoader from "../Loader/CustomLoader"; import PostSkeleton from "./PostSkeleton"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Post = ({ data }) => { const { createdAt, _id, title, tags, viewCount, user, imageUrl } = data; return (
{user.fullname.split(" ")[0]} {createdAt}

{title}

{tags.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} ))}

{viewCount}
0
); }; export default Post;
